column1: Naval and fishing communities are advised not to venture into the above sea areas, until further

W
ind speed may increase up to (50-60) kmph at times in the sea areas off the coast extending from
Chilaw to Galle via Colombo and from Kankasanthurai to Trincomalee via Mullaittivu. The naval and
fishing communities engaged in fishing and naval activities in these sea areas are requested to be vigilant

T
he wave height may increase about 3.0 meters in the sea areas off the coast extending from
Mannar to Pottuvil via Puttalam, Colombo, Galle and Hambantota. There is a possibility of surges
due  to  swell  waves  over  the  coastal  areas  extending  from  Mannar  to  Pottuvil  via  Puttalam,
